data.comment: Jasper Vergoote starts the match. Mouscron with the kick-off in Mouscron.
Deni Hocko (Mouscron) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Stade Le Canonnier.
The second-half has commenced. Zulte with the kick-off.
Alessandro Ciranni (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Virgiliu Postolachi with Harlem Gnohere. This is the first substitution made today by Fernando Da Cruz.
Olivier Deschacht (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Jasper Vergoote.
Bassem Srarfi is replacing Saido Berahino for Zulte at Stade Le Canonnier.
In the minute 73, Goal! Zulte have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Ibrahima Seck.
Fernando Da Cruz is making the team's second substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Beni Badibanga replacing Imad Faraj.
Darly Nlandu is replacing Deni Hocko for the home team.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Zulte.
In the minute 86, Abdoulaye Sissako is on a sub for Omar Govea for Zulte.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
